text: At #KubeCon Day 2 keynotes, @holly_cummins highlights the way we are using #kubernetes and #cloudnative ecosystem can have a serious impact on planet and #sustainability if we are not cautious about our #config and #FinOps practices #betterUtilisation #dezombizication #kubesprawl https://t.co/Y4TPQCR6sS

author.name: Philippe Ensarguet
author.description: Senior tech exec | 2021 Awarded CTO | CTO at @orangebusiness | Board advisor @weaveworks @cycloid_io | Speaker | @TechRocksFr curator | Bike addict
